Text: More tests Horoscopes And a NEW Address Book Were launching a new Emode And we wanted to give you a sneak peek at whats in store for you your family and friends Weve added a great NEW address book that will make it easier than ever before to share test results polls and even horoscopes with friends and family Now you can invite one two even ALL the names in your address book to take your favorite tests and laugh about the results And speaking of tests why not take one our hottest tests right now Which Friend are you eredirmu Whats Your Theme Song eredirmu Which Movie Parent are You eredirmu Weve got tons of new ones too Coming soon to Emode Special edition Halloween tests Have You Reached Your Sexual Peak Can You Survive Kenya Emodes parody of Survivor III Whats Your Lucky Charm Which Soprano are You Which Soap Opera Diva are You And if thats not enough heres what youll find in November More horoscopes to keep up with the stars New quizzes and polls to see what you have in common with other Emode users Games to share with friends and family Better access to your personal account so you can compare test results with friends Contests that put you headtohead with other people in the Emode community The one newsletter you cant live without Emodes more fun than ever Tests have never been such a blast Sharings never been this contagious So dont get left behind From
